answers.answer: Congratulations.Now you can focus on stopping smoking and eating a balanced diet (balanced in all respects including amount/calories).
lol - I was thinking the same thing, Jerry.  Get off the butts, Septiva.  One less cause for the heart problems, and you'll live longer to talk about it, too.  :)

question: Well I found out that my blood sugar (of all things) was giving me PACS and PVCS. I was diagnosed with Type 2 diabetes and began taking metformin. Now the only time I get palpitations is when I smoke way too much or when I don't eat enough.
title: Found out what was causing palpitations
